typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_OpportunityProductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_OpportunityProductid as string,
		productid as string,
		opportunityid as string,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_OpportunityProductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_OpportunityProductid as string,
		productid as string,
		opportunityid as string,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
source(output(
		SK_productid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_productid as string,
		productnumber as string,
		productname as string,
		BK_family as string,
		standarcost as decimal(19,4),
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Products
source(output(
		SK_opportunityid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_opportunityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		parentaccountid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		closeprobability as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp,
		purchasetimeframe as integer,
		opportunityratingcode as integer,
		status as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Opportunities
STG derive(STGHASH = crc32(512,toInteger(toString(amount),'############'),toInteger(toString(priceunit),'############'),toInteger(toString(quantity),'####'))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_OpportunityProductid == DWH@SK_OpportunityProductid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	DWH@HASHKEY != STGHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar, Products join(Split@Nuevos@productid == BK_productid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
JoinOpportunity derive(STGProduct = SK_productid,
		STGOpportunity = SK_opportunityid,
		{Rectify Modifiedon} = toDate(Split@Nuevos@modifiedon)) ~> DerivedColumn1
JoinProducts, Opportunities join(Split@Nuevos@opportunityid == BK_opportunityid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOpportunity
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_opportunityproductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		{SK oportunityid} as integer,
		SK_productid as integer,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		modifiedon as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_opportunityproductid = Split@Nuevos@SK_OpportunityProductid,
		HASHKEY = STGHASH,
		{SK oportunityid} = STGOpportunity,
		SK_productid = STGProduct,
		amount = Split@Nuevos@amount,
		quantity = Split@Nuevos@quantity,
		priceunit = Split@Nuevos@priceunit,
		modifiedon = {Rectify Modifiedon}
	)) ~> Nuevos
Actualizar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_opportunityproductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		{SK oportunityid} as integer,
		SK_productid as integer,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		modifiedon as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_OpportunityProductid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Actualizaciones
